title: Large colonial bungalow for sale near Galle
details: Beautiful colonial house in need of renovation sitting on 386 perches of land,surrounded by lush jungle that consists of a variety of mature trees. This property is located with in 10 min drive of white sandy beaches of Unawatuna bay and The Galle Fort. The existing house could be easily transformed into a wonderful Family/Holiday home. The grounds are quite magnificent and could be developed with more guest bungalows or just landscaped in to beautiful gardens. This is a rear example of a period prime property.
